data.name: Goat of Duty Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Official Soundtrack of Goat of Duty, which includes 4 songs and more than 300 bleats recorded by us! (no goats were hurt during the recording process).

We are already very proud of all of you goating around this sensational multiplayer shooter! You are amazing players and we encourage you to purchase this DLC if you want to keep supporting this initiative with us.
